title: Inbound visitor growth in the Middle East 2011 to 2019
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Year-over-year visitor growth, with a total of 9 data points. The chart has 5 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely positive which exists from 2014 to 2011.
Similarly, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2016 to 2014.
But, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2019 to 2018.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is moderately negative which exists from 2018 to 2017.
On the other hand, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2017 to 2016.
gold: This statistic shows inbound visitor growth in the Middle East from 2011 to 2019 . In 2016 , inbound visitor numbers to the Middle East grew by 1.2 percent and by around 2.5 percent in the previous year , showing a decline compared to eight percent growth in 2014 .
